title: Customer Reports Service Outage
description: A customer calls to report a total loss of mobile service. The agent must check for known outages and provide an estimated time for resolution.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their service location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer account and verifies their location.

tasks.description: Check the network status map for known outages in the customer's area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly uses the outage map tool to determine if there is a reported outage affecting the customer.

tasks.description: Inform the customer about the outage and provide the estimated time to resolution (ETR).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the outage status and ETR to the customer.
